docs.text: Toika Web Server Software that allows you to control a Toika dobby loom from any modern web browser, e.g. on a phone or tablet. For more information, read the main documentation . You must decide whether the control direction (weave/unweave) using the REVERSE button on the dobby head or the direction button in the browser display. Read more about this at Weave Direction . Make your choice in the Settings panel. Links toika_loom_server depends on base_loom_server , which does most of the work. toka_loom_server is served on PyPI . Source code is on github . Please report issues using base_loom_server's issue tracker . Help with translations to other languages is much appreciated. Acknowledgements Thanks to Jukka Yrjölä and Jarkko Yrjölä from Toika for providing the API and helpful clarification. Thanks to WillowGoose ( willowlovestoweave on Instagram) for patiently testing this software and proving valuable feedback.
